model

Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Figure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Figure_I, Figure_J, Figure_L, Figure_O, Figure_S, Figure_T, Figure_Z

    public abstract class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the figure (tetromino). It consists of 4 Blocks, blocks can be removed if lines are cleaned. If all 4 Blocks was removed the Figure is removed also.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Figure(int firstX, int firstY, int secondX, int secondY, int thirdX, int thirdY, int fourthX, int fourthY, int textureImg)
      Constructor takes 9 parameters, coordinates for 4 Blocks and color of figure.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Figure

        public Figure(int firstX,
              int firstY,
              int secondX,
              int secondY,
              int thirdX,
              int thirdY,
              int fourthX,
              int fourthY,
              int textureImg)
        Constructor takes 9 parameters, coordinates for 4 Blocks and color of figure. It is creating 4 new Blocks with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        firstX - X position of first Block (number of column)
        firstY - Y position of first Block (number of row)
        secondX - X position of second Block (number of column)
        secondY - Y position of second Block (number of row)
        thirdX - X position of third Block (number of column)
        thirdY - Y position of third Block (number of row)
        fourthX - X position of fourth Block (number of column)
        fourthY - Y position of fourth Block (number of row)
        textureImg - index in color Array

      • setBlockImg

        protected void setBlockImg(int color,
                           int nr)
        Setting the color of block at given index.
        Parameters:
        color - Index of color in color array.
        nr - Index of block in blocks array.

      • getNrOfBlocks

        public int getNrOfBlocks()
        Returns:
        blocks number of this figure

      • removeBlock

        public void removeBlock(int index)
        Removing block at given index
        Parameters:
        index - index of Block in ArrayList

      • rotate

        public boolean rotate(boolean[][] isPanelTaken)
        The method, which is responsible for rotating the figures. This method is overriden by Figure_I and Figure_O. Figures are rotated around the central Block (except Figures I and O). At first it is checked if rotating is possible.
        Parameters:
        isPanelTaken - 2-D boolean array which informs if the panel is taken by any figure
        Returns:
        false if cannot rotate, true if figure was rotated
